text:
Hi guys, I'm gonna show you how you can
get those beautiful capsules out of a

pomegranate, really quick, and I'm gonna show
you how to juice it.
Buy yourself a beautiful pomegranate, cut it open

put your fingers open like that, hold
the half over a bowl or salad or any

dish and just give a good spanking which
most people love, and they literally just tumble

out once you've done that you might find
the odd little bit of white skin and that's

bitter so get rid of that. Absolutely
beautiful, full of life

full of colour. Let me show you the next thing
which is quite nice. Put your hands in

front of this beautiful pomegranate and
simply squeeze the juice out of it. It's
the most incredible colour. Top it up with some tap water, some fizzy water give it a little bit of a

stir up, lovely. So there you go guys that's how to
take the capsules out of a pomegranate and juice it.
Guys, if you like that don't forget share it on your social media and for more tips, hit the link.
